title: New: Youth Lagoon – Mute
content:
Trevor Powers, also known as Youth Lagoon, has just released another song from his upcoming and exquisitely titled album, Wondrous Bughouse.

 The album will be released on the 5th March by the lovely folk over at Fat Possum.

You can stream the latest cut from the album, ‘Mute’. below. Enjoy!
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d11
